analysis.description:
BlockPoints.receiveApproval (/unique_chucks/27/0x6cbf42cba480511f454e81a5fd6f087fb17d90d9.sol#194-200) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-TOCCall.transferFrom(_from,this,_value) (/unique_chucks/27/0x6cbf42cba480511f454e81a5fd6f087fb17d90d9.sol#200)

BlockPoints.ConvertBkp (/unique_chucks/27/0x6cbf42cba480511f454e81a5fd6f087fb17d90d9.sol#274-298) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-TOCCall.transfer(msg.sender,pr.n2) (/unique_chucks/27/0x6cbf42cba480511f454e81a5fd6f087fb17d90d9.sol#297-298)

BlockPoints.ConvertColouredBkp (/unique_chucks/27/0x6cbf42cba480511f454e81a5fd6f087fb17d90d9.sol#299-328) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-TOCCall.transfer(msg.sender,pr.n5) (/unique_chucks/27/0x6cbf42cba480511f454e81a5fd6f087fb17d90d9.sol#327)
